ConnectAsMaster.name: ConnectAsMaster
ConnectAsMaster.description: Grants permission to connect as a master to the signaling channel specified by the endpoint

ConnectAsViewer.name: ConnectAsViewer
ConnectAsViewer.description: Grants permission to connect as a viewer to the signaling channel specified by the endpoint

CreateSignalingChannel.name: CreateSignalingChannel
CreateSignalingChannel.description: Grants permission to create a signaling channel

CreateStream.name: CreateStream
CreateStream.description: Grants permission to create a Kinesis video stream

DeleteEdgeConfiguration.name: DeleteEdgeConfiguration
DeleteEdgeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete the edge configuration of your Kinesis Video Stream

DeleteSignalingChannel.name: DeleteSignalingChannel
DeleteSignalingChannel.description: Grants permission to delete an existing signaling channel

DeleteStream.name: DeleteStream
DeleteStream.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Kinesis video stream

DescribeEdgeConfiguration.name: DescribeEdgeConfiguration
DescribeEdgeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the edge configuration of your Kinesis Video Stream

DescribeImageGenerationConfiguration.name: DescribeImageGenerationConfiguration
DescribeImageGenerationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the image generation configuration of your Kinesis video stream

DescribeMappedResourceConfiguration.name: DescribeMappedResourceConfiguration
DescribeMappedResourceConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the resource mapped to the Kinesis video stream

DescribeMediaStorageConfiguration.name: DescribeMediaStorageConfiguration
DescribeMediaStorageConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the media storage configuration of a signaling channel

DescribeNotificationConfiguration.name: DescribeNotificationConfiguration
DescribeNotificationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the notification configuration of your Kinesis video stream

DescribeSignalingChannel.name: DescribeSignalingChannel
DescribeSignalingChannel.description: Grants permission to describe the specified signaling channel

DescribeStream.name: DescribeStream
DescribeStream.description: Grants permission to describe the specified Kinesis video stream

GetClip.name: GetClip
GetClip.description: Grants permission to get a media clip from a video stream

GetDASHStreamingSessionURL.name: GetDASHStreamingSessionURL
GetDASHStreamingSessionURL.description: Grants permission to create a URL for MPEG-DASH video streaming

GetDataEndpoint.name: GetDataEndpoint
GetDataEndpoint.description: Grants permission to get an endpoint for a specified stream for either reading or writing media data to Kinesis Video Streams

GetHLSStreamingSessionURL.name: GetHLSStreamingSessionURL
GetHLSStreamingSessionURL.description: Grants permission to create a URL for HLS video streaming

GetIceServerConfig.name: GetIceServerConfig
GetIceServerConfig.description: Grants permission to get the ICE server configuration

GetImages.name: GetImages
GetImages.description: Grants permission to get generated images from your Kinesis video stream

GetMedia.name: GetMedia
GetMedia.description: Grants permission to return media content of a Kinesis video stream

GetMediaForFragmentList.name: GetMediaForFragmentList
GetMediaForFragmentList.description: Grants permission to read and return media data only from persisted storage

GetSignalingChannelEndpoint.name: GetSignalingChannelEndpoint
GetSignalingChannelEndpoint.description: Grants permission to get endpoints for a specified combination of protocol and role for a signaling channel

JoinStorageSession.name: JoinStorageSession
JoinStorageSession.description: Grants permission to join a storage session for a channel

JoinStorageSessionAsViewer.name: JoinStorageSessionAsViewer
JoinStorageSessionAsViewer.description: Grants permission to join a storage session for a channel as viewer

ListEdgeAgentConfigurations.name: ListEdgeAgentConfigurations
ListEdgeAgentConfigurations.description: Grants permission to list an edge agent configurations

ListFragments.name: ListFragments
ListFragments.description: Grants permission to list the fragments from archival storage based on the pagination token or selector type with range specified

ListSignalingChannels.name: ListSignalingChannels
ListSignalingChannels.description: Grants permission to list your signaling channels

ListStreams.name: ListStreams
ListStreams.description: Grants permission to list your Kinesis video streams

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with your resource

ListTagsForStream.name: ListTagsForStream
ListTagsForStream.description: Grants permission to fetch the tags associated with Kinesis video stream

PutMedia.name: PutMedia
PutMedia.description: Grants permission to send media data to a Kinesis video stream

SendAlexaOfferToMaster.name: SendAlexaOfferToMaster
SendAlexaOfferToMaster.description: Grants permission to send the Alexa SDP offer to the master

StartEdgeConfigurationUpdate.name: StartEdgeConfigurationUpdate
StartEdgeConfigurationUpdate.description: Grants permission to start edge configuration update of your Kinesis Video Stream

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to attach set of tags to your resource

TagStream.name: TagStream
TagStream.description: Grants permission to attach set of tags to your Kinesis video streams

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from your resource

UntagStream.name: UntagStream
UntagStream.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from your Kinesis video streams

UpdateDataRetention.name: UpdateDataRetention
UpdateDataRetention.description: Grants permission to update the data retention period of your Kinesis video stream

UpdateImageGenerationConfiguration.name: UpdateImageGenerationConfiguration
UpdateImageGenerationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the image generation configuration of your Kinesis video stream

UpdateMediaStorageConfiguration.name: UpdateMediaStorageConfiguration
UpdateMediaStorageConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create or update an mapping between a signaling channel and stream

UpdateNotificationConfiguration.name: UpdateNotificationConfiguration
UpdateNotificationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the notification configuration of your Kinesis video stream

UpdateSignalingChannel.name: UpdateSignalingChannel
UpdateSignalingChannel.description: Grants permission to update an existing signaling channel

UpdateStream.name: UpdateStream
UpdateStream.description: Grants permission to update an existing Kinesis video stream
